scenes.description: Transition screen 'NEXT' followed by a group shot of hololive members and a countdown sequence.
Performance of the song 'Hapi Choco' by Tokino Sora, Hoshimachi Suisei, Natsuiro Matsuri, Momosuzu Nene, Aki Rosenthal, and Hakui Koyori.
MC segment after the song, thanking the audience and introducing the next performance.

subtitles.original: ハピチョコ
subtitles.english: Hapi Choco

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲・編曲：ヤマモトショウ
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition/Arrangement: Sho Yamamoto

subtitles.original: Happy New Year そろそろ考えなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Happy New Year, it's about time I start thinking

subtitles.original: みんながちょっとうるさいし まずは作戦会議
subtitles.english: Everyone's being a bit noisy, so let's have a strategy meeting first

subtitles.original: あけおめ！今から始まるラブストーリーとか？
subtitles.english: Happy New Year! Maybe a love story starting now?

subtitles.original: そんなんじゃないし 本命は私
subtitles.english: It's nothing like that, I'm the one they really like

subtitles.original: 今日が本番だっていうの？
subtitles.english: You say today is the big day?

subtitles.original: 大事なのはここから1ヶ月 じらしたいな
subtitles.english: What's important is the month from now, I want to keep them waiting

subtitles.original: 大人になったって ドキドキしてたいもん だって
subtitles.english: Even when I'm an adult, I still want to feel my heart racing because...

subtitles.original: 両思いの先払いに
subtitles.english: In advance of our mutual love

subtitles.original: うんと
subtitles.english: A lot

subtitles.original: 甘い甘い甘い甘い 甘いの好き好き好き好き
subtitles.english: Sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet, I love, love, love, love sweets

subtitles.original: っていう私が選んだ君は とびきりのスイート
subtitles.english: That's what I said, and the one I chose is you, the sweetest of all

subtitles.original: 甘い甘い甘い甘い 一年で
subtitles.english: Sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet, in a year

subtitles.original: 一番の贅沢でも しちゃいましょうよ
subtitles.english: Let's have the biggest luxury of all

subtitles.original: チョチョチョトチョコあとは
subtitles.english: Cho-cho-cho-choco, and then

subtitles.original: 予算とカロリーとかオーバーでもね あーあ
subtitles.english: Even if we go over budget and calories, oh well

subtitles.original: チョチョチョトチョコレート
subtitles.english: Cho-cho-cho-chocolate

subtitles.original: 私の恋とかにご褒美あげたい
subtitles.english: I want to give a reward to my love or something

subtitles.original: もう今日だって会いたいわ 決めました
subtitles.english: I've decided I want to see you even today

subtitles.original: お宅用ですか？って なんでわかったの
subtitles.english: Is it for home use? How did you know?

subtitles.original: そうでもやっぱ みんなそわそわしちゃうの
subtitles.english: Still, everyone ends up getting restless

subtitles.original: そりゃそうだけどね よそ見したらそれも変かな
subtitles.english: Well, that's true, but would it be weird to look away too?

subtitles.original: ねぇ 呼び出しなんて なになに
subtitles.english: Hey, what's with the summoning?

subtitles.original: 今のところは 帰って楽しみたかったのにな
subtitles.english: I was looking forward to going home and enjoying myself for now

subtitles.original: でもあれ 私が欲しかった可愛いやつじゃない
subtitles.english: But isn't that the cute thing I wanted?

subtitles.original: 気になるこれ片想い
subtitles.english: It's on my mind, this unrequited love

subtitles.original: でもっと
subtitles.english: And more

subtitles.original: 甘い甘い甘い甘い 甘いの好き好き好き好き
subtitles.english: Sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet, I love, love, love, love sweets

subtitles.original: そんな私にあなたがくれた とびきりのサプライズ
subtitles.english: For someone like me, you gave me the biggest surprise

subtitles.original: やばいやばいやばいやばい そんなこと
subtitles.english: Oh no, oh no, oh no, oh no, that kind of thing

subtitles.original: 想像もしてなかったの 眠れないね
subtitles.english: I hadn't even imagined it, I can't sleep

subtitles.original: 1ヶ月も悩むなんて
subtitles.english: Worrying for a whole month

subtitles.original: そんなの無理じゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't that impossible?

subtitles.original: 私毎日が 本命全力
subtitles.english: Every day for me is full effort for the one I love

subtitles.original: そういうのが好きでごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for liking that kind of thing

subtitles.original: うんと
subtitles.english: A lot

subtitles.original: 甘い甘い甘い甘い 甘いの好き好き好き好き
subtitles.english: Sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet, I love, love, love, love sweets

subtitles.original: っていう私が選んだ君は とびきりのスイート
subtitles.english: That's what I said, and the one I chose is you, the sweetest of all

subtitles.original: 甘い甘い甘い甘い 一年で
subtitles.english: Sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet, in a year

subtitles.original: 一番の贅沢でもしよう
subtitles.english: Let's have the biggest luxury of all

subtitles.original: うんと
subtitles.english: A lot

subtitles.original: 甘い甘い甘い甘い 甘いの好き好き好き好き
subtitles.english: Sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet, I love, love, love, love sweets

subtitles.original: っていう私が選んだ君は とびきりのスイート
subtitles.english: That's what I said, and the one I chose is you, the sweetest of all

subtitles.original: 甘い甘い甘い甘い 一年で
subtitles.english: Sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet, in a year

subtitles.original: 一番の贅沢でも しちゃいましょうよ
subtitles.english: Let's have the biggest luxury of all

subtitles.original: チョチョチョトチョコあとは
subtitles.english: Cho-cho-cho-choco, and then

subtitles.original: 予算とカロリーとかオーバーでもね あーあ
subtitles.english: Even if we go over budget and calories, oh well

subtitles.original: チョチョチョトチョコレート
subtitles.english: Cho-cho-cho-chocolate

subtitles.original: 私の恋とかにご褒美あげたい
subtitles.english: I want to give a reward to my love or something

subtitles.original: 私の今日からにご褒美あげたい
subtitles.english: I want to give a reward starting from my today

subtitles.original: みんなできたー！？
subtitles.english: Everyone, did you manage to do it!?

subtitles.original: まだまだ...
subtitles.english: Not yet...

subtitles.original: まだあるからね！
subtitles.english: There's still more!

subtitles.original: 次はチームBで... SHOWTIME ROLLER!
subtitles.english: Next is Team B with... SHOWTIME ROLLER!
